data: faculty restaurant of Cleaver University | court between the building and the massive white wall | Cleaver Spaceport

Shortly after noon, a small side door in the faculty restaurant of Cleaver University opened and a man and a woman stepped out into the sunlight of the wide, empty court between the building and the massive white wall opposite it which bordered Cleaver Spaceport.
